title: Looking for a T214 Victory Evers
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Looking for a T214 Victory Evers
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for a T214 Victory Tobacco of Johnny Evers. I have other Victorys for trade or would purchase. Also interested in other cards of Evers you may have other than t206.
Email [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]
Thanks
Mike
Good luck Mike. That is one tough card my friend. I personally have not seen one ever.

yes , good luck. I had 16 of them and never an Evers or FOrd that another member mentioned.

Mark MaCrae, has a zillion, but Iam sure well kept.

I've never seen one either, just hoping one exists and the owner will trade or sell. I know its a longshot but you never know till you ask. I've got two(both in good condition) I would trade for a decent Evers.

Anyone ever seen this card?
Thanks
Mike
